entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.

Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate.
